source(output(
		Category_sqnr as integer,
		Category_ID as integer,
		Load_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		Record_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HUBCategory
source(output(
		Building_sqnr as integer,
		Building_ID as integer,
		Load_date_timestamp as timestamp,
		Record_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HUBBuilding
source(output(
		Category_ID as integer,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Category
HUBCategory, Category lookup(HUBCategory@Category_ID == Category@Category_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
BuildingsJson filter(!isNull(BRIDGE_SELL_PRICE_M2)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(Category = 'Bridge') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Building_ID as integer,
		Construction_cost_m2 as double,
		Demolish_cost_m2 as double,
		Buyout_cost_m2 as double,
		Sell_price_m2 as double,
		Parking_lot_demand_per_m2 as double,
		Parking_lots_per_m2 as double,
		Category as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Building_ID = ID,
		Construction_cost_m2 = BRIDGE_CONSTRUCTION_COST_M2,
		Demolish_cost_m2 = BRIDGE_DEMOLISH_COST_M2,
		Buyout_cost_m2 = BRIDGE_BUYOUT_COST_M2,
		Sell_price_m2 = BRIDGE_SELL_PRICE_M2,
		Parking_lot_demand_per_m2 = BRIDGE_PARKING_LOTS_DEMAND_PER_M2,
		Parking_lots_per_m2 = BRIDGE_PARKING_LOTS_PER_M2,
		Category
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
